heroSection.headline: Best in class science that puts you in control

childMarkdownRemark.html: Everlywell has modernized lab testing by bringing access to credible, validated laboratory tests that are initiated and collected by you in the comfort and convenience of your own home. We aim to empower individuals to be proactive about their health, and our commitment to quality and accuracy is the same that you would expect from your doctor’s office. Through the combination of best-in-class science, physician oversight, and rigorously validated collection methods and service, we ensure the best quality testing by working with labs that meet the following standards:

description.description: Everlywell has modernized lab testing by bringing access to credible, validated laboratory tests that are initiated and collected by you in the comfort and convenience of your own home. We aim to empower individuals to be proactive about their health, and our commitment to quality and accuracy is the same that you would expect from your doctor’s office. Through the combination of best-in-class science, physician oversight, and rigorously validated collection methods and service, we ensure the best quality testing by working with labs that meet the following standards:

childMarkdownRemark.html: Certified under the Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments of 1988 (CLIA) regulations

description.description: Certified under the Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments of 1988 (CLIA) regulations

childMarkdownRemark.html: Clinically-validated tests as compared with traditional sample collection methods

description.description: Clinically-validated tests as compared with traditional sample collection methods

childMarkdownRemark.html: Experienced, diverse clinical team that oversees every step of the testing process

description.description: Experienced, diverse clinical team that oversees every step of the testing process

childMarkdownRemark.html: Each laboratory used to process your sample is CLIA-certified, which means they must meet or exceed federal precision, accuracy, and validity standards. They also obtain state licensure and submit themselves to regular inspections as well as independent third-party performance verifications.

description.description: Each laboratory used to process your sample is CLIA-certified, which means they must meet or exceed federal precision, accuracy, and validity standards. They also obtain state licensure and submit themselves to regular inspections as well as independent third-party performance verifications.

sections.title: Physician Involvement
sections.headline: Physician approved every step of the way

childMarkdownRemark.html: Everlywell works with an independent network of board-certified physicians to support your full testing experience. A physician will review your lab requisition, which is required for testing, and approve eligible orders. The same physician will also review your final test results when completed by the lab. For diagnostic tests such as our STI tests, a physician consultation and prescription (when indicated) is offered for positive results.

description.description: Everlywell works with an independent network of board-certified physicians to support your full testing experience. A physician will review your lab requisition, which is required for testing, and approve eligible orders. The same physician will also review your final test results when completed by the lab. For diagnostic tests such as our STI tests, a physician consultation and prescription (when indicated) is offered for positive results.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our tests provide personalized information and education that empowers you to be more involved with and educated about your own health. We offer a “doctor friendly” version that you can print or email for sharing with your physician, in a format they are used to seeing when normally reviewing lab results. We always encourage you to share your results with your physician with any questions you have regarding your medical care.

We offer a “doctor friendly” version that you can print or email for sharing with your physician, in a format they are used to seeing when normally reviewing lab results. We always encourage you to share your results with your physician with any questions you have regarding your medical care.

sections.title: Collection Methods
sections.headline: At-home self-collected samples that are validated against traditional methods

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our at-home sample collection methods have been clinically validated against traditional methods to meet rigorous standards for test accuracy and reliability. Dried blood spot testing and many other collection methods we offer, like saliva and urine, have been trusted sample collection methods for over 30 years. We offer established collection methods, carefully and optimally designed so that quality lab testing can happen from home.

description.description: Our at-home sample collection methods have been clinically validated against traditional methods to meet rigorous standards for test accuracy and reliability. Dried blood spot testing and many other collection methods we offer, like saliva and urine, have been trusted sample collection methods for over 30 years. We offer established collection methods, carefully and optimally designed so that quality lab testing can happen from home.

listOfContentWithImages.heading: Dr. Liz Kwo, MD, MBA, MPH
listOfContentWithImages.title: Clinical Leadership

childMarkdownRemark.html: Before joining Everly Health, Dr. Kwo served as Deputy Chief Clinical Officer for Anthem, VP and GM of Provider Networks at American Well, and Entrepreneur in Residence at Harvard Medical School's Office of Technology Development. Board Certified in Preventive Care and Occupational Medicine, Dr. Kwo remains active as a practicing physician at Cambridge Health Alliance, of Harvard Medical School. She holds a BA from Stanford, an MPH from the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, an MBA from Harvard Business School, and an MD from Harvard Medical School. Dr. Kwo also has founded multiple venture-backed companies including the educational platform New Pathway and digital healthcare company InfiniteMD.

description.description: Before joining Everly Health, Dr. Kwo served as Deputy Chief Clinical Officer for Anthem, VP and GM of Provider Networks at American Well, and Entrepreneur in Residence at Harvard Medical School's Office of Technology Development. Board Certified in Preventive Care and Occupational Medicine, Dr. Kwo remains active as a practicing physician at Cambridge Health Alliance, of Harvard Medical School. She holds a BA from Stanford, an MPH from the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, an MBA from Harvard Business School, and an MD from Harvard Medical School. Dr. Kwo also has founded multiple venture-backed companies including the educational platform New Pathway and digital healthcare company InfiniteMD.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Before joining Everly Health, Dr. Northrop served as Chief Scientific Officer at Aspira Women’s Health, SVP of Clinical Genetics at Celmatix, and has held several leadership positions around ideation and innovation of clinical diagnostic test development. Dr. Northrop has designed and built seven CLIA/CAP/NYS diagnostic high-complexity testing laboratories, developed and validated breakthrough clinical diagnostic tests predominately in genomic health. Dr. Northrop received her PhD in Neuroendocrinology and Reproduction from Boston University, completed a clinical molecular genomics post-doctoral fellowship at the top fertility center in the U.S. and was boarded a ABMGG clinical molecular geneticist fellow at Columbia University Medical Center. Currently Dr. Northrop serves as Everlywell Diagnostic Laboratory Director and oversees all diagnostic test operations and development at Everly Health.

description.description: Before joining Everly Health, Dr. Northrop served as Chief Scientific Officer at Aspira Women’s Health, SVP of Clinical Genetics at Celmatix, and has held several leadership positions around ideation and innovation of clinical diagnostic test development.  Dr. Northrop has designed and built seven CLIA/CAP/NYS diagnostic high-complexity testing laboratories, developed and validated breakthrough clinical diagnostic tests predominately in genomic health.  Dr. Northrop received her PhD in Neuroendocrinology and Reproduction from Boston University, completed a clinical molecular genomics post-doctoral fellowship at the top fertility center in the U.S. and was boarded a ABMGG clinical molecular geneticist fellow  at Columbia University Medical Center. Currently Dr. Northrop serves as Everlywell Diagnostic Laboratory Director and oversees all diagnostic test operations and development at Everly Health.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Dr. Jeffrey Blumberg is an active Professor Emeritus at the Friedman School of Nutrition Science and Policy at Tufts University. He has participated in activities relevant to the incorporation of sound nutrition science into public health policy, including work as a member of the Workshop on Health Promotion and Aging in the Office of the U.S. Surgeon General, Sports Medicine Committee of the U.S. Olympic Committee, Consultation on Preparation and Use of Food-Based Dietary Guidelines for the WHO/FAO, Food Advisory Committee of the FDA, and other committees. His research has been focused on the role of nutrition in promoting health and preventing disease.

description.description:
Dr. Jeffrey Blumberg is an active Professor Emeritus at the Friedman School of Nutrition Science and Policy at Tufts University. He has participated in activities relevant to the incorporation of sound nutrition science into public health policy, including work as a member of the Workshop on Health Promotion and Aging in the Office of the U.S. Surgeon General, Sports
Medicine Committee of the U.S. Olympic Committee, Consultation on Preparation and Use of Food-Based Dietary Guidelines for the WHO/FAO, Food Advisory Committee of the FDA, and other committees. His research has been focused on the role of nutrition in promoting health and preventing disease.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Dr. Taylor is a Professor and Chair, Department of Obstetrics Gynecology and Reproductive Sciences. He is a board certified specialist in Obstetrics and Gynecology and in Reproductive Endocrinology. His clinical research centers on endometriosis and fibroids. His basic science research focuses on uterine development, endometriosis, endocrine disruption, and on stem cells.

description.description: Dr. Taylor is a Professor and Chair, Department of Obstetrics Gynecology and Reproductive Sciences. He is a board certified specialist in Obstetrics and Gynecology and in Reproductive Endocrinology. His clinical research centers on endometriosis and fibroids. His basic science research focuses on uterine development, endometriosis, endocrine disruption, and on stem cells.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Everlywell is dedicated to informing and enriching the medical and scientific community through clinical research. Everlywell’s clinical studies focus on building the scientific evidence and clinical utility of consumer-initiated lab testing to help engage customers in their healthcare journey. Our research programs are guided by the latest approaches to testing to inform the areas of COVID-19 and infectious diseases, heart health, sexual health, men’s and women’s health, and nutrition. We incorporate clinical and data science best practices to understand complex, real-world data.

description.description: Everlywell is dedicated to informing and enriching the medical and scientific community through clinical research. Everlywell’s clinical studies focus on building the scientific evidence and clinical utility of consumer-initiated lab testing to help engage customers in their healthcare journey.  Our research programs are guided by the latest approaches to testing to inform the areas of COVID-19 and infectious diseases, heart health, sexual health, men’s and women’s health, and nutrition. We incorporate clinical and data science best practices to understand complex, real-world data.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Under no circumstance do we ever sell our customers' data, and we use state-of-the-art, bank-grade encryption to ensure data security. Customer information is only shared with the labs and physicians that are part of our testing process. Everlywell's best-in-class, secure handling of personal health information earned the company “Highly Compliant” status per the HIPAA/HITECH Security Standards.

Everlywell is not only the market leader in the consumer-initiated, at-home collection lab testing space, but we also strive to be a thought leader in the clinical community. We seek supplemental data from our customers for more qualitative aspects of our research on an opt-in, voluntary basis only. We will always anonymize, de-identify, and aggregate data in any published research we produce. Check out our full privacy policy for more details.
